Yan'S idea huh?
::Koj::
Koj studies the scanning array looks at a blip "What is that? Teltran1 zoom 
in." Koj studies it "Its a ship and from the look of things not a maximal 
one"

::Liono::
Sends a message "This is Ark a defense space once you breach this we well 
label you as hostiles and be forced to Attack." End message. "We better get 
ready for battle. At the most we have 3 or 4 hours until the reach us. Our 
best bet is to stop them before they reach us."

::Koj::
"Let get ready to defend." As Koj starts pushing crates together to make a 
shift wall. "I'm not Broke up"

::Liono::
Liono helps push Crates together making a makes shift wall."Because I dream 
my way."

::Dark::
"Void pull up you security blue prints." Dark studies the plans "We have 
shields on the plus sides with a little work we can have some turrets 
online.I'll work on the LA 2.

::Inu::
Starts fixs the power cells to some guns.
